cause.description:
We need to figure out some ways to prevent global warming from destroying the earth. The polar bears in Antartica are dying almost everyday. We need to help. These polar bears are getting extinct because of us. We need to take a stand once and for all.
1. Hunting polar bears has to stop
2. Stop useing cars and ride a bike
3. Turn off the light when its not needed
cause.name: SAVE THE POLAR BEARS
